name: Rooke
description:
A 2D pixel platformer in which you play as a young amphibious dwarf by the name of Rooke. Traverse various levels, fighting against various oceanic creatures and inland creatures, on your quest for adventure!

Controls: 

Use A and D to move left and right.

Press k for melee slash.

Hold and release to shoot orbs.

Press shift to dash.

Press space for jump and double space for double jump!

Special thanks to Minh Kieu for lending us his character for inspiration. You can check out his work here: https://minhk.net/
